text.tspan: Road mortality rate, IHME vs. WHO data, 2019
Mortality rate from road injuries is measured per 100,000 people. Also shown is the line of parity (along which
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019); World Health Organization (via World Bank)
